𒊍 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒍝 ≠ 𒀾 aš
𒊍 AZ = 𒊊𒍝 PIRIĜ.ZA
𒊍 AS in 𒄑𒊍 אָסָא ʾāsā آس ʔās myrtle
𒊍 ᵐAS мышъэ məŝe "bear" ≈ myrtle
𒊍 ᵇAS •beast 𒀖 ox
𒊍 •ᵇURS bear #asu ursu 𒄯𒁖𒂵𒀸 ḫartakkaš خرس xers ⇔ Aas AS aṣ

𒊍𒍝𒋡 •URS.z.k riesig @ Elamite

󳧖 󳥴 󳥵 󳥶 󳥷 󳥸 󳥹

𒁕𒁍 da-buʳ דבא debā ድብ dəb "Depp"
𒁕𒁍 the Bear

honey

𒊍 AS ≈ عسل ʕásal ⇔ 𒄑𒊍 אָסָא ʾāsā آس ʔās
𒊍 ᵐAS мышъэ məŝe ⇔ ደምስ dämǝsǝ
𒊍 ≈ 𒁕𒁍 dabu דבא debā ድብ dəb ⇔ ܕܒܫܐ deḇšā דּוּבְשָׁא dûḇšā 𒋭 dišpu
𒊍 мірт ⇔ ማር mar ⇔ մուրտ медвѣдь medvědĭ "bear"

𒈥𒄖 mar-gu medo mèdved PSM
𒈥𒄖 margu ⇔ maru 𓃬
𒈥𒄖 bear > بالو bālǔ

𒊊 lābu 𓃬 ⋍ 𒊋 𓃮 leopard
𒊍 PIRIĜ x KAL "lion" NIB = leopard

𒊊 𓃬 unrelated in late form:
𒊍 = 𒊊𒍝 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒍝 🐻
𒊋 = 𒊊𒆗 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒄑𒀀 𓃮
𒊌 = 𒊊𒌓 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒑊𒁹 𓃬 / 𓃮

𒊌 = 𒊊 PIRIĜ bear / parther : tiger

𒊍𒍪𒉿𒀸 /azzuwas/ horse PIE *h₁éḱwos 𔑮𔐓𔗵𔗬 {EQUUS}á-sù-wa "Perseus"

𒊍𒁁 az-ziz a-cess=sit set stand

Part of outstanding superlative
𒈾𒊍𒍝𒍪𒍑 na-az-za-zu-uš -azazus -issimus (foremost)

𒊍 AS- verbal prefix aus-… zer-…

𒊍𒈽𒈠 as-suḫ-ma aus-zieh.ma "rip out"
𒊍𒁁 as-bat aus-fahrt "take the road" 𓂘 as 𓃀 pod
𒊍𒁁 aṣ-bat aṣ-battle "seize (a city)" 𓂘
𒊍𒄣𒌒 az-qu-up 𓋴 𓐪 up "set up"
𒊍𒄣𒌒 az-qu-up az-equip "erect"
𒊍𒇺 as-liš aus-lösch "•slaughter like a lamb 𒇻"
𒊍𒁍𒌦 as-pu-un as-plain "level"

תָא -ṯā 𐎚 > 𒊍 -ess/-essa female suffix: prince/princess :
𒊬𒊑 šar-ri shar>sultan:king =>
𒊬𒊏𒊍 šar-ra-as •sharess цари́ца caríca cȁrica (queen)

𒊌 𒉡 uq-nu | lapis lazuli | 𐎛𐎖𐎐𐎜 ỉqnủ … ???
𒊌 𒉡 uq-nu | lapis lazuli | < •aquarny > asurⁿ ⇔ azureⁿ blue (see 𒊌 for R component)

𒊍 az as article or determinant “beast” ass/horse/… ?

𒊍𒈠𒊒 az'ma-ru 𐎎𐎗𐎈 mrḥ רֹמַח rómaẖ “(horse?) lance” reverse

𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | ⇔ {ass}equippe 𓃘 𓃗 🐪 🐫 ϫⲁⲙⲟⲩⲗ
𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | a •quibb™ gibb™ gep gibbus 곱사 gopsa gibber gibbᵒⁿ gibb.nam 𒉆 > גַּבְנוּן gavnún “hump” OK?
𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | •gibb™ ⇔ грпка grpka gȑba (Graf/grab?) कूबड़ kūbaṛ < καμπούρα kampoúra
𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | •qubts > غوز quz گوژ guž
𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | •gibb™ ⇔ कूबड़ kūbaṛ гъ́рбица gǎ́rbica бүкір bükir Buckel reverse ⇔ bonggol
𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | •qimpt > *kumb- “curved” corcova hump(ed) < ⋍cramped Krüppelt! ⇔ krumm
𒊍𒁺𒁉𒌅 as'qub-bi-tu | ⋍•verkrüppelt

𒆳𒊍𒁺𒁲 KUR.as-du-di the land Ashdod

𒌋𒊏𒊍𒋛 u-ra-aṣ-ṣi erase "destroy" 𒉒⋅𒑲𒍝 ⇔ 𒄤 𒄢 𒅆

𒊍𒁁 az-bat 𓃀 expede
𒊍𒁀𒋫 𒄯𒊏𒉡 az-ba-ta mur-ra-nu ex-pode marching

𒄑𒊍 {ĝeš} az asu אָסָא ʾāsā آس ʔās myrtle
𒄑𒋆𒊍 ĝeš šim az
𒄑𒋆𒊍 šim•ursu > ምርሰኔ mərsäne մրտենի mrteni (s)myrtle мірт մուրտ murt

熊 xióng ≈ 香木桃 xiāngmùtáo ≈ myrtle "Bärenfuß(peach)"
熊 xióng ≈ 香木桃 xiāngtáomù ≈ tumay "Bär"
